I'm interested in using gravitational wave observations to:

  • Estimate the source properties of detected signals using Bayesian Inference
  • Learn about stellar evolution and compact binary formation channels
  • Infer cosmological parameters (i.e. Hubble expansion rate, matter/dark-energy densities, etc)
  • Constrain possible models for the behavior of dense nuclear matter
  • Test General Relativity
